long_description: Built with signature quality, the Thule Urban Glide is a lightweight, agile, easy-fold stroller that also boasts a water-resistant compartment-ideal for jogs on muddy trails or in iffy weather. Swivelling front wheel offers easy maneuverability and locks into place for jogging. Ergonomic handlebar with a range of heights offers excellent comfort for either parent. Multi-position canopy for sun or rain protection with view-in roof port to see your child. Rear suspension creates a smooth and comfortable ride. The Thule Urban Glide stroller has a padded seat that reclines to a near flat position for on-the-go naps; vented at top. One-handed compact fold for storing and transporting; folded dimensions are 34.5 x 21 x 14 in.
short_description: Built with signature quality, the Thule Urban Glide is a lightweight, agile, easy-fold stroller that also boasts a water-resistant compartment-ideal for jogs on muddy trails or in iffy weather.
